lead_paragraph: Concerned colleagues often warn of the perils of work-place romances but Britain's badminton power couple Chris and Gabby Adcock believe marriage has only made their on-court performance more harmonious.

headline.print_headline: Badminton: British Sweethearts Wedded to Dream of Rio Gold
headline.main: Badminton: British Sweethearts Wedded to Dream of Rio Gold
